name: download-telegram-bot
description: Downloads forwarded contents from Telegram to your local computer
bin: npm run apiServer && npm run prod

scripts.apiServer:remove: docker stop telegram-bot-api-server; docker container rm telegram-bot-api-server
scripts.apiServer: npm run apiServer:remove; docker run -d --rm -p 8081:8081 --name=telegram-bot-api-server -v telegram-bot-api-data:/var/lib/telegram-bot-api --env-file .docker.env aiogram/telegram-bot-api
scripts.start: npm run apiServer && nodemon --watch 'src/**/*' --watch .env --ext ts,json --exec npm run dev
